sourcesContent:
URLs

ID Long Form Short Form
{{ url.id }} {{ url.longForm }} {{ url.shortForm }}
import { Component, Inject } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-url-table', templateUrl: './url-table.component.html' }) export class UrlTableComponent { public urls: UrlLink[] = []; constructor(private http: HttpClient, @Inject('BASE_URL') private baseUrl: string) { this.fetchUrls(); } fetchUrls() { this.http.get(this.baseUrl + 'api/url').subscribe(result => { this.urls = result; }, error => console.error(error)); } openUrl(url: UrlLink) { console.log('Open URL:', url); } deleteUrl(event: MouseEvent, id: string) { event.stopPropagation(); console.log('Delete URL:', id); } } interface UrlLink { id: string; longForm: string; shortForm: string; createdBy: string; createdAt: Date; }
